name: Acid Crest Labs
description:
Features

  • 10+ levels
  • 20+ interactable NPC characters
  • Randomly generated codes

What's This About?

Ever since blowing up the Acid Crest Labs. facility on the moon, Sharon's been living in an RV in the mountains. After getting tired of monotonous hours reading books and watching the grass grow, she decides to get out and explore the unexplored mountains; and she finds some comrades along the way.

Sharon's back, and ready for more than ever. Fight though level after level, colleting new vomit variants, beer bottles, and interact with the dozens NPCs available!
